short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets students build a to-do list from Google Classroom assignments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows students to display a list of their unsubmitted assignments from Google Classroom and to select items to place on a To-Do List. Assignments include links back to google classroom and overdue items are highlighted with red due dates. (Extension icon credit: Kusniyah at the Noun Project)
